alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 25 at 1:47AM CDT until October 29 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...From this morning to early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 43.02 feet. - Bankfull stage is 43.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this morning to 52.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall tomorrow evening. It will rise to 54.0 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 55.6 feet on 06/27/1998. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 200 PM CDT.
